!raram: displays an analysis of your last game.
!raram help: displays all commands and their description
!raram verify <name>: links your Discord to your LoL account
!raram start <amount>: starts a ranked queue of <amount> of games.
!raram add <amount>: adds <amount> of games to the ranked queue.
!raram remove <amount>\n: removes <amount> of games from the ranked queue.
